price: ফলত সিহঁতে থিয় হ’বলৈকেও সক্ষম নহ’ল আৰু প্ৰতিৰোধো কৰিব নোৱাৰিলে।
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
